title: CONTAINERYARD / LIGHT BENDING GUY
description: Dialogue with a man so rich that light literally bends around his face.

dialogueTree.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Welcome back, friend. What can I d..."
dialogueTree.text: "Welcome back, friend. What can I do for you?" Although you cannot see his face, you can tell he's smiling warmly.

links.title: You: ""Who are you?""
links.text: "Who are you?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Who *am* I? Oh, I haven't been ask..."
links.text: "Who *am* I? Oh, I haven't been asked that question for such a long time." There's genuine surprise in his voice. "I don't meet a lot of people outside my circle these days..."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Anyhow, my name is Roustame Diodor..."
links.text: "Anyhow, my name is Roustame Diodore -- investor, licence holder, and extremely high-net-worth individual. And you are?"

links.title: Savoir Faire: "We've hit the big time! This is the..."
links.text: We've hit the big time! This is the man who's going to make you *rich*. Always rely on your friendly neighbourhood swindler.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mr. Diodore, I am Lieutenant Kim K..."
links.text: "Mr. Diodore, I am Lieutenant Kim Kitsuragi of the RCM, and this is my partner..."

links.title: You: ""It's Harrier Du Bois, but I prefer..."
links.text: "It's Harrier Du Bois, but I prefer to be called Tequila Sunset."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Pleasure to meet you Harr... I mea..."
links.text: "Pleasure to meet you Harr... I mean, Tequila Sunset," he says warmly. "It is an odd name, to be sure. There's something... rather grim about it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You would not even believe," the l..."
links.text: "You would not even believe," the lieutenant mutters to himself.

links.title: You: ""Harrier Du Bois.""
links.text: "Harrier Du Bois."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Pleasure to meet you, Harrier Du B..."
links.text: "Pleasure to meet you, Harrier Du Bois," he says warmly. "I must admit, the name suits you very well."

links.title: You: ""My name is Harry, and I'm a detect..."
links.text: "My name is Harry, and I'm a detective."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Pleasure to meet you, Harry," he s..."
links.text: "Pleasure to meet you, Harry," he says warmly. "Public service is a noble cause."

links.title: You: ""My name is Harry, and I'm an alcoh..."
links.text: "My name is Harry, and I'm an alcoholic."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Pleasure to meet you, Harry," he s..."
links.text: "Pleasure to meet you, Harry," he says warmly. "Though I'm sorry to hear a good man like yourself is in servitude to the drink. But then, nobody's perfect."

links.title: You: ""My name is Harry, and I'm an alcoh..."
links.text: "My name is Harry, and I'm an alcoholic detective."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Pleasure to meet you, Harry," he s..."
links.text: "Pleasure to meet you, Harry," he says warmly. "Though I'm sorry to hear a good public servant like yourself is in servitude to *the drink*. A man can't serve two masters, in my experience."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can assure you, Mr. Diodore, tha..."
links.text: "I can assure you, Mr. Diodore, that despite his vices he is a competent detective."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you ask me, he's only serving o..."
links.text: "If you ask me, he's only serving one of them thus far," the lieutenant mutters, half to himself.

links.title: You: ""The name's Raphaël Ambrosius Coste..."
links.text: "The name's Raphaël Ambrosius Costeau. Most likely."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Pleasure to meet you, Raphaël," he..."
links.text: "Pleasure to meet you, Raphaël," he says warmly. "I am surprised -- in a positive manner, do understand -- about your exceedingly high-net-worth name."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It is not..." The lieutenant stops..."
links.text: "It is not..." The lieutenant stops to rub his temples. "Never mind."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Oh, don't you worry, lieutenant. I..."
links.text: "Oh, don't you worry, lieutenant. I can tell a good man when I see one."

links.title: You: ""I'm an alcoholic.""
links.text: "I'm an alcoholic."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Pleasure to meet you," he says war..."
links.text: "Pleasure to meet you," he says warmly. "Though I'm sorry to hear a good man like yourself is in servitude to the drink. But then, nobody's perfect."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can assure you, Mr. Diodore, tha..."
links.text: "I can assure you, Mr. Diodore, that despite his vices he is a competent detective."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you ask me, he's only serving o..."
links.text: "If you ask me, he's only serving one of them thus far," the lieutenant mutters, half to himself.

links.title: You: ""I'm a detective.""
links.text: "I'm a detective."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Pleasure to meet you," he says war..."
links.text: "Pleasure to meet you," he says warmly. "Public service is a noble cause."

links.title: You: ""I'm an alcoholic detective.""
links.text: "I'm an alcoholic detective."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Pleasure to meet you," he says war..."
links.text: "Pleasure to meet you," he says warmly. "Though I'm sorry to hear that a good public servant like yourself is in thrall to the drink. A man can't serve two masters, in my experience."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "You better explain that you aren't..."
links.text: You better explain that you aren't Savvy, by the way. Can't have you nicking this identity after working hard to gain such a prodigious rep.

links.title: You: ""Actually, Savvy *isn't* my name. H..."
links.text: "Actually, Savvy *isn't* my name. Hope you'll excuse me. Let me introduce myself again..."

links.title: You: ""How did you become so rich?""
links.text: "How did you become so rich?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh, lord, not this again.""
links.text: "Oh, lord, not this again."

links.title: You: ""What's the matter, Kim?""
links.text: "What's the matter, Kim?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh, nothing. It's just that we've..."
links.text: "Oh, nothing. It's just that we've got this *murder* to solve, and yet you go around asking everyone about *money*. And every time I ask, 'Are you sure this is related to the case?', you say, 'Sure, Kim. I think it is'..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And yet it never seems to get us a..."
links.text: "And yet it never seems to get us any closer to solving the case."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "The man chuckles. "It's quite alrig..."
links.text: The man chuckles. "It's quite alright. I'm used to the question by now. To be blunt, I inherited my fortune from my grandmother, who, herself, was an extremely high-net-worth individual back in Graad..."

links.title: You: "Ignore him."
links.text: Ignore him.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We have a *murder* to solve, and y..."
links.text: "We have a *murder* to solve, and yet you go around bothering everyone about *money*, arguing that you think it's 'somehow related to the case.'"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "The man chuckles. "To be perfectly..."
links.text: The man chuckles. "To be perfectly blunt, I inherited my fortune from my grandmother, who, herself, was an extremely high-net-worth individual back in Graad..."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""All I did was take her fortune and..."
links.text: "All I did was take her fortune and invest it prudently. Believe it or not, it takes more than a bit of skill not to blow a vast fortune on sailing boats, bad choices, and *unsupervised* state policy."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "And blow."
links.text: And blow.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Actually -- at the level this guy i..."
links.text: Actually -- at the level this guy is, it takes several generations to do that, but all right.

links.title: You: ""What's it like being an extremely..."
links.text: "What's it like being an extremely high-net-worth individual?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "The man exhales with a whistle. "I..."
links.text: The man exhales with a whistle. "I gotta tell you, at first, being rich is a lot of work. You've got to work hard because everything's so darn expensive. You know, prices increase exponentially at this income level..."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""But then, once you've reached my p..."
links.text: "But then, once you've reached my position, it's nearly impossible for me *not* to make money. My assets are so diversified that I'm bound to come out ahead no matter what..."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Some of my lower-net-worth friends..."
links.text: "Some of my lower-net-worth friends say to me, 'But doesn't that take all the fun out of it?' and I tell them, 'Not really.'"

links.title: You: ""Man, being a high-net-worth indivi..."
links.text: "Man, being a high-net-worth individual sounds great."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""It is, truly. It's almost entirely..."
links.text: "It is, truly. It's almost entirely care free." He nods. "It really leaves you time to better yourself spiritually."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Hey, HEY. All this talk about money..."
links.text: Hey, HEY. All this talk about money has made you lose the thread. What is going on with the light in this place? *That's* what you need to ask him about!

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Capital." He nods. "Makes one spee..."
links.text: "Capital." He nods. "Makes one speechless, does it not? Blinds like the sun that rises from beyond the horizon after a gloomy winter."

links.title: You: ""You're right. Capital accumulation..."
links.text: "You're right. Capital accumulation is its own reward."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Precisely! You know, I hear people..."
links.text: "Precisely! You know, I hear people talk sometimes about *economic equality* and *fairness* and all that kind of stuff. But tell me, where would we be without liberalism? In caves! Whacking each other with bones!"

links.title: You: ""Just a bunch of evil apes dukin' i..."
links.text: "Just a bunch of evil apes dukin' it out on a giant ball."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Exactly!" He agrees. "A world of s..."
links.text: "Exactly!" He agrees. "A world of slavery and violence. Which brings us back to the essential truth of modernism..."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Where we are right now, the freedo..."
links.text: "Where we are right now, the freedom of mankind can only be derived from the free flow of capital."

links.title: You: ""That would suck.""
links.text: "That would suck."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""A nightmare scenario. A world of s..."
links.text: "A nightmare scenario. A world of slavery and violence. Which brings us back to the essential truth of modernism..."

links.title: You: ""Don't you think that you should us..."
links.text: "Don't you think that you should use your great wealth for the glory of your fatherland?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Which one? Revachol, where I nomin..."
links.text: "Which one? Revachol, where I nominally reside? Or Graad, where my father emigrated from? Or Ile-de-Casherbrume where I've registered my shell companies?"

links.title: You: ""For almighty Revachol, of course!""
links.text: "For almighty Revachol, of course!"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Listen, if capital and nationalism..."
links.text: "Listen, if capital and nationalism went hand in hand, there'd be no need to ask the question..."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""States are akin to boulders in a r..."
links.text: "States are akin to boulders in a river, slowing the free flow of ideas. Given enough time, the water will wear those boulders down."

links.title: You: ""Oh, probably Graad, in that case.""
links.text: "Oh, probably Graad, in that case."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, that last one. Ile-de-Casher..."
links.text: "Yeah, that last one. Ile-de-Casherbrume."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Maybe I should? Sadly, I've never..."
links.text: "Maybe I should? Sadly, I've never been there. I'm sure it's nice but in the end -- does it matter?"

links.title: You: ""You're a thief. People out there a..."
links.text: "You're a thief. People out there are working their asses off while you *chill* here."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""And that's, what? Unjust? I think..."
links.text: "And that's, what? Unjust? I think it's perfectly just." His tone is ever-so-slightly less agreeable than before.

links.title: You: ""What do you mean?""
links.text: "What do you mean?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Listen, I used to be an idealist,..."
links.text: "Listen, I used to be an idealist, just like you. But the truth is that we have no objective system by which to measure someone's value other than the market. We should just embrace that, rather than resist it..."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""The hand that allocates resources..."
links.text: "The hand that allocates resources among men is invisible and cruel, but it is *steady*, *measured*, indeed it is *just*."

links.title: You: ""You're using your money as its own..."
links.text: "You're using your money as its own justification."

links.title: You: ""It's great that you've done so wel..."
links.text: "It's great that you've done so well for yourself, but don't you think you owe some of that wealth to the rest of society?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Sure, and they benefit when I buy..."
links.text: "Sure, and they benefit when I buy things to stimulate the economy. Do you know how many jobs it takes to build and maintain a racing yacht?"

links.title: You: ""Hundreds?""
links.text: "Hundreds?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""*Dozens*, at least. Of course, in..."
links.text: "*Dozens*, at least. Of course, in the future it'll all be automated. But my point is this..." he says, jabbing his finger into the air a bit...

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Every man gets what he earns. It's..."
links.text: "Every man gets what he earns. It's the height of tyranny to take that from him."

links.title: You: ""Thousands?""
links.text: "Thousands?"

links.title: You: ""A million?!""
links.text: "A million?!"

links.title: You: ""Cool. I don't even have any intere..."
links.text: "Cool. I don't even have any interesting replies."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""One would imagine living such a hi..."
links.text: "One would imagine living such a high-net-worth existence is overwhelmingly exciting, but yes, as you now see... it can sometimes just stun you with its boredom."

links.title: You: ""Cool. But I want to ask you about..."
links.text: "Cool. But I want to ask you about something else."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Go right ahead.""
links.text: "Go right ahead."

links.title: You: ""There's something strange about yo..."
links.text: "There's something strange about you."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""What do you mean?" His... essence..."
links.text: "What do you mean?" His... essence seems to signify actual surprise.

links.title: You: ""Well, I don't know how to put it....."
links.text: "Well, I don't know how to put it... you look... somehow... a little different."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Are you talking about my chin?""
links.text: "Are you talking about my chin?"

links.title: You: ""No-no, I mean, I can't even see......"
links.text: "No-no, I mean, I can't even see... *you*, it's as if something is happening to the light."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Oh, *that's* what you mean. Yes, I..."
links.text: "Oh, *that's* what you mean. Yes, I've heard of this effect, though I've never witnessed it myself, of course. It has something to do with our Weiss-Wiesemann coefficient."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The Weiss-Wiesemann coefficient is..."
links.text: The Weiss-Wiesemann coefficient is a ratio designed to reflect the difference in net worth between individuals. When the coefficient is close to 1 (or 100%) it means one person possesses all the net worth among that group of individuals. It's been observed that when the Weiss-Wiesemann coefficient reaches about .96 or so, the laws of physics begin to bend around the high-net-worth individual.

links.title: You: "So what is our coefficient?"
links.text: So what is our coefficient?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The Weiss-Wiesemann coefficient for..."
links.text: The Weiss-Wiesemann coefficient for you and this individual appears to be...

links.title: Encyclopedia: ".9998 repeating."
links.text: .9998 repeating.

links.title: Logic: "That's not good -- for you."
links.text: That's not good -- for you.

links.title: You: ""Are you telling me that you are so..."
links.text: "Are you telling me that you are so rich that light literally bends around your face?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Among other things... but calm dow..."
links.text: "Among other things... but calm down, I'm but a lowly single-digit billionaire."

links.title: You: ""Really?""
links.text: "Really?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""No, not really. There are actually..."
links.text: "No, not really. There are actually quite many digits."

links.title: Suggestion: "A man this *chill* is at least a tr..."
links.text: A man this *chill* is at least a triple-digit billionaire.

links.title: You: ""I'm calm.""
links.text: "I'm calm."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""That's good.""
links.text: "That's good."

links.title: You: ""Kim, are you seeing this weird stu..."
links.text: "Kim, are you seeing this weird stuff?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I see nothing of the sort. To be f..."
links.text: "I see nothing of the sort. To be frank, all I see is a gentleman who's unusually well dressed for Martinaise. In a cargo container. Which, I admit, is odd."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Yes. I imagine that *does* look st..."
links.text: "Yes. I imagine that *does* look strange to you. My container."

links.title: You: ""Our what?""
links.text: "Our what?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""It's some statistical thing. In es..."
links.text: "It's some statistical thing. In essence, it says that when an extremely *low*-net-worth individual meets an extremely *high*-net-worth individual, some of the laws of physics cease to apply."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, it's the chin.""
links.text: "Yeah, it's the chin."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant leans in and whisper..."
links.text: The lieutenant leans in and whispers to you: "Please, behave yourself."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Hm. I've never heard anybody say a..."
links.text: "Hm. I've never heard anybody say anything about my chin. Yet I know that people often tell each other half-truths, things they think the other party would wish to hear..."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Being rich does not make one imper..."
links.text: "Being rich does not make one impervious to the human condition. Maybe I do have a strange chin and you are the first person to call me out on this. Not that you should. But you did. For this -- I am grateful."

links.title: You: ""It's actually nothing. Forget I sa..."
links.text: "It's actually nothing. Forget I said anything."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Go right ahead, don't be shy.""
links.text: "Go right ahead, don't be shy."

links.title: You: ""It's as if something is happening..."
links.text: "It's as if something is happening to the light."

links.title: You: ""It's *really* nothing.""
links.text: "It's *really* nothing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant seems *very* relieve..."
links.text: The lieutenant seems *very* relieved.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Oh, alright then. Another question.""
links.text: "Oh, alright then. Another question."

links.title: You: ""What are you doing in this contain..."
links.text: "What are you doing in this container?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Travelling! This is a great way to..."
links.text: "Travelling! This is a great way to get around -- it's fun, it's safe, and it gives me lots of time to think..."

links.title: Endurance: "Wouldn't say it's exactly *safe* no..."
links.text: Wouldn't say it's exactly *safe* now -- but financially secure individuals are known adrenaline junkies.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""By the way, let me now ask *you* a..."
links.text: "By the way, let me now ask *you* a question: Where are we, exactly?"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "In the very, very early days of col..."
links.text: In the very, very early days of colonizing this archipelago, the Kingdom of Suresne, a precursor of modern Sur-La-Clef, used to own the city of Revachol. An obscure detail in the bigger picture, but still -- worth dropping.

links.title: You: ""We're in Revachol, formerly a colo..."
links.text: "We're in Revachol, formerly a colony of the Kingdom of Suresne."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Ah, a fellow history buff! I, myse..."
links.text: "Ah, a fellow history buff! I, myself, am currently reading up on Franconigerian-era trains. Very interesting stuff. "

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""It's a shame I can't get out and e..."
links.text: "It's a shame I can't get out and explore myself. One of the downsides of being an extremely high-net-worth individual is that mobs of low-net-worth individuals are constantly banding together to ask for money."

links.title: You: ""Wait -- why don't you help them? Y..."
links.text: "Wait -- why don't you help them? You've got so much money it can't make a difference to you."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""There simply aren't enough hours a..."
links.text: "There simply aren't enough hours a day to hand out all the handouts. It's like feeding seagulls. There are always more, and they never seem to do anything interesting with it -- except more seagulls."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Spending money is a matter of desi..."
links.text: "Spending money is a matter of desire, I'm sure you agree. I don't have the desire for spending it like that."

links.title: You: ""So you travel from place to place..."
links.text: "So you travel from place to place via shipping container?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Smart, no? It also provides a mean..."
links.text: "Smart, no? It also provides a means to hide from all the targeted advertising we extremely high-net-worth individuals are constantly subjected to..."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Luxury yachts, high-fidelity porta..."
links.text: "Luxury yachts, high-fidelity portable radio systems, pale-proof outerwear, and so on. It just gets a bit *middle class* after a while. A bit *bourgeois.*"

links.title: You: ""Ah, so you're saying being rich is..."
links.text: "Ah, so you're saying being rich isn't worth the hassle."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""What? No, I didn't say that at all..."
links.text: "What? No, I didn't say that at all. Being rich is great. Just don't tell anyone I told you that." The bending light appears to *wink*.

links.title: You: ""Those things all sound pretty nice.""
links.text: "Those things all sound pretty nice."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Don't get me wrong: They're nice t..."
links.text: "Don't get me wrong: They're nice things, but once you achieve a certain level of wealth your time and mental space become *much* more important than material goods."

links.title: Empathy: "He speaks from the heart. He has ve..."
links.text: He speaks from the heart. He has very different problems compared to low-net-worth individuals such as yourself. For example, no problems at all.

links.title: You: ""Good. Now that we've sorted that o..."
links.text: "Good. Now that we've sorted that out, let me ask you something else."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Go right ahead.""
links.text: "Go right ahead."

links.title: You: "(Yawn.) "Yeah, that does sound pret..."
links.text: (Yawn.) "Yeah, that does sound pretty tiresome."

links.title: You: ""We're in Martinaise, a district of..."
links.text: "We're in Martinaise, a district of Revachol -- the former capital of the world."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Ah, Revachol. I remember walking i..."
links.text: "Ah, Revachol. I remember walking its streets as a teenager. There used to be a bowling alley in Stella Maris... I wonder if it's still there?"

links.title: You: ""We're in Martinaise. There's a pre..."
links.text: "We're in Martinaise. There's a pretty good hostel here called the Whirling-in-Rags."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Ah, interesting. I've made quite a..."
links.text: "Ah, interesting. I've made quite a few real-estate plays over the years."

links.title: You: ""We're in Martinaise. There's a coo..."
links.text: "We're in Martinaise. There's a cool church here."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Was it Kras Mazov that said 'relig..."
links.text: "Was it Kras Mazov that said 'religion is pyrholidon for the masses'?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""He may have been a communard, but..."
links.text: "He may have been a communard, but we're in agreement about that. Still, I imagine the architecture is quite lovely."

links.title: You: ""We're in Martinaise. There's a cre..."
links.text: "We're in Martinaise. There's a creepy abandoned commercial area here."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Well, as we say in my circle -- on..."
links.text: "Well, as we say in my circle -- one person's crushing business failure is someone else's development opportunity."

links.title: You: ""Ummm... I really don't know.""
links.text: "Ummm... I really don't know."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What the detective means is that w..."
links.text: "What the detective means is that we're in Martinaise, a subdistrict of Jamrock in the capital city of Revachol."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "He smiles. "Never mind then. We'll..."
links.text: He smiles. "Never mind then. We'll just have to be on equal footing, geographically speaking."

links.title: You: ""You're a rich investor, right? Can..."
links.text: "You're a rich investor, right? Can I have some money?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Could you please stop asking *ever..."
links.text: "Could you please stop asking *everyone* for money? It does not reflect well on the RCM and to be perfectly frank we can't afford to look worse than we already do."

links.title: You: ""But Kim! I also can't *afford* to..."
links.text: "But Kim! I also can't *afford* to look any better than I do now. That's why I need the money!"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""It's perfectly alright. Based on y..."
links.text: "It's perfectly alright. Based on your appearance I can tell I'm dealing with a smart man..."

links.title: You: ""You're right. That was extremely u..."
links.text: "You're right. That was extremely unprofessional. I apologize."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""It's perfectly alright. Based on y..."
links.text: "It's perfectly alright. Based on your appearance I can tell I'm dealing with a civilized man..."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Playing the pity card, are we? What..."
links.text: Playing the pity card, are we? Whatever gets us over the moon, baby, I'm your hand to be dealt.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Could you please stop asking peopl..."
links.text: "Could you please stop asking people for money? It does not reflect well on the RCM and to be perfectly frank we can't afford to look worse than we already do."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't see how it's appropriate f..."
links.text: "I don't see how it's appropriate for a representative of the law to ask a wealthy person for money. This shines a... bad light on the RCM, if you catch my meaning."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Come now, there is not even a scen..."
links.text: "Come now, there is not even a scent of corruption here. I am merely being polite... so let me check my pockets."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Sure! Let me check my pockets.""
links.text: "Sure! Let me check my pockets."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""As you may know, us high-net-worth..."
links.text: "As you may know, us high-net-worth individuals do not have a lot of cash on hand. Investments and liquidity are enemies of one another -- I think I only have coins for coffee machines."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Here's three reál, how much can yo..."
links.text: "Here's three reál, how much can you get for this?"

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Unbelievable. You manage to meet a..."
links.text: Unbelievable. You manage to meet a man who's so rich light *literally bends around him* and all you can get out of him is three reál? What's wrong with you?

links.title: You: ""It gets me almost nothing.""
links.text: "It gets me almost nothing."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""That's the idea, my friend! You've..."
links.text: "That's the idea, my friend! You've got to work for the rest."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Maybe you can make that money grow..."
links.text: "Maybe you can make that money grow? Come up with an investment plan? How's that sound?"

links.title: Empathy: "This is a proposal, not a question."
links.text: This is a proposal, not a question.

links.title: Suggestion: "These ultraliberal types love losin..."
links.text: These ultraliberal types love losing huge sums of money on ludicrous proposals. Ergo, you should come up with a plan that's TOTALLY dead in the water.

links.title: You: ""Thank you for your kindness.""
links.text: "Thank you for your kindness."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""You're welcome. You know..." His e..."
links.text: "You're welcome. You know..." His eyes narrow, the light seems to bend more *aggressively*.

links.title: You: ""Are you sure you don't have any mo..."
links.text: "Are you sure you don't have any more? I thought you were a billionaire?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Yes, I'm sure. You know..." His ey..."
links.text: "Yes, I'm sure. You know..." His eyes narrow, the light seems to bend more *aggressively*.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Reminds you of that Joyce woman, do..."
links.text: Reminds you of that Joyce woman, doesn't he? Can't get rich by giving out free money.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Come on, man. He's *got* to have mo..."
links.text: Come on, man. He's *got* to have more than that. See if you can score a little more of that *lucre*.

links.title: You: "Present a sound investment plan."
links.text: Present a sound investment plan.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Deploying high-concept buzzword gen..."
links.text: Deploying high-concept buzzword generator. All systems functional: Ready to engage in 3, 2, 1...

links.title: Conceptualization: "It's time to disrupt the future. Yo..."
links.text: It's time to disrupt the future. You've got to stay lean, innovative, and focus on what matters most: *the children*.

links.title: Suggestion: "Steal the Union boss's idea, add a..."
links.text: Steal the Union boss's idea, add a twist, and present it as your own? Very capitalistic!

links.title: Conceptualization: "If business planning were really yo..."
links.text: If business planning were really your strong suit, you probably wouldn't be a cop.

links.title: You: ""Okay, so I've got this idea for a..."
links.text: "Okay, so I've got this idea for a board game."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Go on.""
links.text: "Go on."

links.title: You: ""Brace yourself. It is *very* high..."
links.text: "Brace yourself. It is *very* high concept."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I'm ready.""
links.text: "I'm ready."

links.title: You: ""Its a pen-and-paper game where peo..."
links.text: "Its a pen-and-paper game where people all over the world can play with each other -- using radios!"

links.title: Suggestion: "Nicking an idea that wasn't worth a..."
links.text: Nicking an idea that wasn't worth anything in the first place and trying to pass it off as your own? How very *entrepreneurial*. I love it.

links.title: You: ""It's a twist on an already establi..."
links.text: "It's a twist on an already established, working idea."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Yes?""
links.text: "Yes?"

links.title: You: ""It's a pen-and-paper role-playing..."
links.text: "It's a pen-and-paper role-playing game -- only the players are connected with radiocomputers!"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Hold on. Have we met before?""
links.text: "Hold on. Have we met before?"

links.title: You: ""I don't think so.""
links.text: "I don't think so."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Yeah, on second thought, it couldn..."
links.text: "Yeah, on second thought, it couldn't have been you."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Your idea reminds me of a group of..."
links.text: "Your idea reminds me of a group of young men who came to me a long time ago, calling themselves 'Fortress Accident' -- the name should've been a red flag."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""They pitched me and a handful of o..."
links.text: "They pitched me and a handful of other investors on an idea for a role-playing game that would, in their words, change the world."

links.title: You: ""What happened?""
links.text: "What happened?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Well, at first everything was rosy..."
links.text: "Well, at first everything was rosy, the ideas were solid, but they were lacking in... how do I put it..."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""They lacked the *will* to get thin..."
links.text: "They lacked the *will* to get things done. As their financial situation became more desperate, their ideas devolved from realistic to absolute insanity."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""We lost all of our money. High-art..."
links.text: "We lost all of our money. High-art types never deliver. They're only good for peddling welkins or whatever creeps they come up with."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I guess the inordinate amount of t..."
links.text: "I guess the inordinate amount of time they poured into drawing mythical creatures did not generate a return on investment."

links.title: You: ""Wait. Where are they now?""
links.text: "Wait. Where are they now?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Nobody knows for sure, but the pla..."
links.text: "Nobody knows for sure, but the place can't be pretty."

links.title: You: ""Did you try to salvage the project..."
links.text: "Did you try to salvage the project somehow?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Sadly, when we got there, it was t..."
links.text: "Sadly, when we got there, it was too late. The concept had run out of steam, only dust remained."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""What I want to tell you is this: i..."
links.text: "What I want to tell you is this: it's a very bad idea. Dead in the water. You seem like a reasonable man, but that is not a reasonable plan."

links.title: Suggestion: "Okay. Well. Maybe I was wrong. We'v..."
links.text: Okay. Well. Maybe I was wrong. We've all learned something today.

links.title: You: ""Thank you for the advice.""
links.text: "Thank you for the advice."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""You're welcome. Now, was there som..."
links.text: "You're welcome. Now, was there something else I could help you with?"

links.title: You: ""Are you *sure* you don't want to g..."
links.text: "Are you *sure* you don't want to give those little welkins a second go?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Absolutely not.""
links.text: "Absolutely not."

links.title: Authority: "Stop embarrassing yourself. Pop a m..."
links.text: Stop embarrassing yourself. Pop a magnesium and calm down.

links.title: You: ""Maybe? I wouldn't really know.""
links.text: "Maybe? I wouldn't really know."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""No, on second thought, it couldn't..."
links.text: "No, on second thought, it couldn't have been you."

links.title: You: ""You should invest in the RCM!""
links.text: "You should invest in the RCM!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He should what?""
links.text: "He should what?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""The volunteer police force? And wh..."
links.text: "The volunteer police force? And why would I do that?"

links.title: You: ""Because it's chronically mismanage..."
links.text: "Because it's chronically mismanaged, deeply corrupt, and completely outmatched."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Just a minute. The RCM has its dif..."
links.text: "Just a minute. The RCM has its difficulties, but generally speaking--"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""You know, that's *exactly* what I'..."
links.text: "You know, that's *exactly* what I've heard. From what I understand, the RCM as currently constituted is essentially a lost cause..."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""That's why I *should* invest? Are..."
links.text: "That's why I *should* invest? Are you trying to say that the RCM's bad reputation makes it an undervalued asset?"

links.title: You: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: You: ""No, I think it's exactly as valuab..."
links.text: "No, I think it's exactly as valuable as it looks."

links.title: You: ""Because they have guns!""
links.text: "Because they have guns!"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I'm already on the board of two ma..."
links.text: "I'm already on the board of two major arms manufacturers. I've got no shortage of guns, if I wanted such things..."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Still, the idea of a privatized po..."
links.text: "Still, the idea of a privatized police force is *extremely* forward thinking. You could even say it's *ultra* ultraliberal..."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Tell me, if you could invest in th..."
links.text: "Tell me, if you could invest in the RCM, where would you direct your resources?"

links.title: Half Light: "Bigger guns! Large-calibre motherfu..."
links.text: Bigger guns! Large-calibre motherfuckers that leave exit wounds the size of grapefruits.

links.title: Interfacing: "The latest technological wonders."
links.text: The latest technological wonders.

links.title: Inland Empire: "The *blaasma gun* that shoots periw..."
links.text: The *blaasma gun* that shoots periwinkle blue high energy plasma! This is your chance...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Take care of the people who protect..."
links.text: Take care of the people who protect the people.

links.title: You: ""Let me tell you about an idea that..."
links.text: "Let me tell you about an idea that combines bigger guns with the latest and greatest in technology progress."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I'm listening.""
links.text: "I'm listening."

links.title: You: ""Imagine, a massive gun that uses a..."
links.text: "Imagine, a massive gun that uses a magnetic accelerator to accelerate highly energized hydrogen-based plasma to near light speed. At contact with anything it detonates with the *power of a dying star*, erasing it from existence in a flash of periwinkle blue!"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "The shape stands in stunned silence..."
links.text: The shape stands in stunned silence.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not the blaasma gun again." The li..."
links.text: "Not the blaasma gun again." The lieutenant takes off the glasses and rubs his eyes with his fingers. "It's not even *possible*."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""It is not possible. But what a dre..."
links.text: "It is not possible. But what a dream..." He shakes his head. "Either way, even if I could do it, I certainly wouldn't give an incompetent and corrupt police force *WORLD-ENDING* weaponry."

links.title: You: ""Large-calibre weapons for patrol o..."
links.text: "Large-calibre weapons for patrol officers."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""You want to take an incompetent an..."
links.text: "You want to take an incompetent and corrupt police force and give them *deadlier* weapons? No, no, that won't work..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If I could interject: the RCM's pr..."
links.text: "If I could interject: the RCM's problems are mainly *structural*. We're hamstrung by a lack of clear lines of authority, and our system of performance reviews strongly *disincentivizes* inter-precinct cooperation."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I think the lieutenant's right. Yo..."
links.text: "I think the lieutenant's right. Your problems run much deeper than equipment or funding. The entire org structure of the RCM needs to be redefined. You need a unified chain of command, new metrics for measuring performance that reward real *police work*. Does that sound right?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, yes! That's *precisely* what..."
links.text: "Yes, yes! That's *precisely* what we need."

links.title: You: ""So you'll do it?"
links.text: "So you'll do it?

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Hell no! Can you imagine how much..."
links.text: "Hell no! Can you imagine how much work that would take? Why would I do that when I can just speculate on exotic financial derivatives from the comfort of this shipping container?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""The thing about investing is that..."
links.text: "The thing about investing is that the less work you have to do, the better. Don't over-think. That's what return on investment means."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant's disappointment is..."
links.text: The lieutenant's disappointment is palpable. It's like someone just shot his dog.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Now, was there anything else I cou..."
links.text: "Now, was there anything else I could help you with?"

links.title: You: ""That sounds like a lot of work.""
links.text: "That sounds like a lot of work."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Precisely, which is why I'm not go..."
links.text: "Precisely, which is why I'm not going to do it. Why would I do that when I can just speculate on exotic financial derivatives from the comfort of this shipping container?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""But I appreciate the *grandiosity*..."
links.text: "But I appreciate the *grandiosity* of your ideas. Thus you might understand -- the entire org structure of the RCM needs to be redefined. You need a unified chain of command, an end to petty spats between precincts, new metrics for measuring performance that reward real *police work*. Does that sound right?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""You need to think *bigger*. The en..."
links.text: "You need to think *bigger*. The entire org structure of the RCM needs to be redefined. You need a unified chain of command, an end to petty spats between precincts, new metrics for measuring performance that reward real *police work*. Does that sound right?"

links.title: You: ""Radiocomputers for every precinct.""
links.text: "Radiocomputers for every precinct."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""The RCM's problems aren't the kind..."
links.text: "The RCM's problems aren't the kind you can solve with *radiocomputers*. The rot goes much deeper than that..."

links.title: You: ""Pay raises for officers and genero..."
links.text: "Pay raises for officers and generous benefits."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Hmm. I don't believe in giving any..."
links.text: "Hmm. I don't believe in giving anyone money for nothing, but maybe there's something to using *market incentives* to improve performance..."

links.title: You: ""Uhhh... I'd pay some designers to..."
links.text: "Uhhh... I'd pay some designers to come up with a new logo and tagline?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Hmmmm, a tried-and-true strategy f..."
links.text: "Hmmmm, a tried-and-true strategy for increasing the perception of value without improving the underlying asset. Not bad. But still..."

links.title: You: ""Because if you don't, who will?""
links.text: "Because if you don't, who will?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I don't believe in handouts, espec..."
links.text: "I don't believe in handouts, especially for people who *volunteered* for their positions..."

links.title: You: "Present an investment plan that is..."
links.text: Present an investment plan that is sure to fail.

links.title: Conceptualization: "What's worse than throwing money at..."
links.text: What's worse than throwing money at something that's already failed?

links.title: Conceptualization: "Congratulations, you've somehow man..."
links.text: Congratulations, you've somehow managed to fail at failing, which means, in a strange way, that you've succeeded?

links.title: You: ""You should invest in a youth centr..."
links.text: "You should invest in a youth centre."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""A youth centre, huh? What *kind* o..."
links.text: "A youth centre, huh? What *kind* of youth centre?"

links.title: Physical Instrument: "A place to train *buff kids*."
links.text: A place to train *buff kids*.

links.title: Empathy: "A place to teach them practical ski..."
links.text: A place to teach them practical skills like teamwork and self-discipline.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Come on. Tell him what he wants to..."
links.text: Come on. Tell him what he wants to hear.

links.title: You: ""One dedicated to instilling libera..."
links.text: "One dedicated to instilling liberal economic values in children from low-net-worth families."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Brilliant! Without children who'll..."
links.text: "Brilliant! Without children who'll be there to buy stuff in the future?"

links.title: You: ""Yes. And if it doesn't work out, w..."
links.text: "Yes. And if it doesn't work out, we can always re-purpose the centre as a shopping mall or private equity firm."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""When life closes a door, it opens..."
links.text: "When life closes a door, it opens a window, yes? What's the expected return on this?"

links.title: You: ""Highly educated, work-ready, human..."
links.text: "Highly educated, work-ready, human capital ready to be directed toward any number of your vast interests."

links.title: Conceptualization: "You're deep into ultraliberal terri..."
links.text: You're deep into ultraliberal territory now. Good work.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Very impressive. You've got a natu..."
links.text: "Very impressive. You've got a natural eye for unusual investment opportunities."

links.title: You: ""Thank you.""
links.text: "Thank you."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I don't normally do this without a..."
links.text: "I don't normally do this without a formal pitch deck, but to hell with it, what's the point of being rich if you have to follow all the rules?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Here's a round of seed funding. Th..."
links.text: "Here's a round of seed funding. This should be enough to prove out the concept and get things off the ground."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "CHA-CHING. What'll it be? Speed? Vo..."
links.text: CHA-CHING. What'll it be? Speed? Vodka? Cigarettes?

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "*Bratan*, now's your chance to take..."
links.text: *Bratan*, now's your chance to take some time off. Spend it with your good buddy, and get absolutely *wrecked* in the process.

links.title: You: ""Hmm. Drugs do go well with money,..."
links.text: "Hmm. Drugs do go well with money, I agree."

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Nothing less than total annihilatio..."
links.text: Nothing less than total annihilation will suffice.

links.title: You: ""Actually, I'm not so sure about th..."
links.text: "Actually, I'm not so sure about that."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at you with ho..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks at you with horror. You've been mumbling to your necktie in a daze for several minutes.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Ah, yes. Now you're displaying it...."
links.text: "Ah, yes. Now you're displaying it... the *eccentricity* that becomes a wealthy individual." If the money-saint's visage weren't wrapped in physics-defying light, you would see his approval.

links.title: You: ""Hello, darkness.""
links.text: "Hello, darkness."

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry, man, I'm an investor no..."
links.text: "I'm sorry, man, I'm an investor now -- I have to stay sober to calculate risks."

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "What is this shit?!? CALCULATING RI..."
links.text: What is this shit?!? CALCULATING RISKS? *BRATAN*. THE RISKS YOU CANT CALCULATE ARE THE ONLY ONES WORTH TAKING!

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry. I just don't see the RO..."
links.text: "I'm sorry. I just don't see the ROI in that."

links.title: You: ""I'll give it some thought.""
links.text: "I'll give it some thought."

links.title: You: ""Thank you for placing your unwaver..."
links.text: "Thank you for placing your unwavering *trust* in me."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Remember: it's not a *handout*, it..."
links.text: "Remember: it's not a *handout*, it's an investment. And I expect to see returns."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant stands there, dumbfo..."
links.text: The lieutenant stands there, dumbfounded. His mouth opens slightly, then closes again.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Is he having a stroke?"
links.text: Is he having a stroke?

links.title: You: ""What do you think, Kim? Not bad, h..."
links.text: "What do you think, Kim? Not bad, huh?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I am not *un*-impressed. Let's lea..."
links.text: "I am not *un*-impressed. Let's leave it at that."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Now, was there anything else I cou..."
links.text: "Now, was there anything else I could help you with?"

links.title: You: ""Kim, are you alright?""
links.text: "Kim, are you alright?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. I'm alright." He pauses to co..."
links.text: "Yes. I'm alright." He pauses to compose himself. "Can we get going now?"

links.title: You: ""Kim, are you having a stroke?""
links.text: "Kim, are you having a stroke?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, I am *not* having a stroke. Yo..."
links.text: "No, I am *not* having a stroke. You're just... still full of surprises. Most of them bad, but some good..."

links.title: Composure: "The lieutenant has granted you an a..."
links.text: The lieutenant has granted you an aura of legitimacy. Bathe in it, but don't let your satisfaction show. Play it cool.

links.title: You: ""Thanks for the handout.""
links.text: "Thanks for the handout."

links.title: You: ""I know.""
links.text: "I know."

links.title: You: ""With human beings there's always a..."
links.text: "With human beings there's always a risk associated. Which is why we've got to hold onto the centre itself as a fallback."

links.title: You: ""One to inspire the future leaders..."
links.text: "One to inspire the future leaders of tomorrow to public service."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Hmmm," the man thinks for a moment..."
links.text: "Hmmm," the man thinks for a moment.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I like that you're thinking about..."
links.text: "I like that you're thinking about the future, but couldn't the centre have a more... economic focus?"

links.title: You: ""You know, a regular youth centre,..."
links.text: "You know, a regular youth centre, with basketball courts and stuff."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""No, no, no. You've got to think *b..."
links.text: "No, no, no. You've got to think *bigger* than that."

links.title: You: ""You know, a regular youth centre,..."
links.text: "You know, a regular youth centre, with basketball courts and stuff. To *really* develop their physical proficiency."

links.title: You: ""You know, a regular youth centre,..."
links.text: "You know, a regular youth centre, with basketball courts and stuff. To teach teamwork and other emotional skills."

links.title: You: ""You should make your money work fo..."
links.text: "You should make your money work for you."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Intriguing. Go on.""
links.text: "Intriguing. Go on."

links.title: You: ""Like they say in investment circle..."
links.text: "Like they say in investment circles, you gotta spend money to make money. Money's the name of the game here."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I think I follow you. You're sayin..."
links.text: "I think I follow you. You're saying I should invest in exotic financial derivatives? Or maybe some kind of real-estate play?"

links.title: You: ""I'm saying it's fun to ride the li..."
links.text: "I'm saying it's fun to ride the lion until it's time to get off."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""But what do you say to those who c..."
links.text: "But what do you say to those who claim that the assets underlying those derivatives are overvalued? Does that pose a systemic risk to the wider capital markets?"

links.title: Conceptualization: "You're in deep now, but don't lose..."
links.text: You're in deep now, but don't lose your nerve. You can do this.

links.title: You: ""You've got to spend money to make..."
links.text: "You've got to spend money to make money."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""You said that already.""
links.text: "You said that already."

links.title: You: ""Look man, markets are always going..."
links.text: "Look man, markets are always going like this." (Make an up-and-down motion with your hand.)

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Yes, yes, but the question is how..."
links.text: "Yes, yes, but the question is how do we take advantage of those fluctuations?"

links.title: You: ""Money literally makes the world go..."
links.text: "Money literally makes the world go round."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Yes, every school child hears that..."
links.text: "Yes, every school child hears that. The question is how do *we* get more of that money?"

links.title: You: ""A wise man once told me that money..."
links.text: "A wise man once told me that money is all about trust."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "The man pauses, considering your wo..."
links.text: The man pauses, considering your words. The light bends and swims around his face. You cannot tell what he's thinking...

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Trust... yes...""
links.text: "Trust... yes..."

links.title: Suggestion: "Who'd have thought you'd remember t..."
links.text: Who'd have thought you'd remember that nugget of wisdom after nearly frying your brain like you have?

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Such a simple truth, yet so easily..."
links.text: "Such a simple truth, yet so easily forgotten. What is money, anyway, but an idea in our heads we all *trust* one another to believe in?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I'm very impressed. You have a dee..."
links.text: "I'm very impressed. You have a deep understanding of the world that few men ever attain."

links.title: You: ""I'm saying there's no sense throwi..."
links.text: "I'm saying there's no sense throwing good money after bad."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""But real-estate is an illiquid ass..."
links.text: "But real-estate is an illiquid asset. What happens if you need a short-term capital infusion and all your holdings are tied up?"

links.title: You: ""Some people say money can't buy ha..."
links.text: "Some people say money can't buy happiness, but those people just didn't have enough money."

links.title: You: ""Have you considered breaking into..."
links.text: "Have you considered breaking into the local art market?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""There it is. I knew it as soon as..."
links.text: "There it is. I knew it as soon as you did the Milton 32-8 knock. A fellow entrepreneur!"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Well, you've already convinced me..."
links.text: "Well, you've already convinced me to invest in you, so please, go on -- tell me about this opportunity. I'm keen."

links.title: You: ""Wait, the Milton 32-8 knock?""
links.text: "Wait, the Milton 32-8 knock?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Yes, the special knock that helps..."
links.text: "Yes, the special knock that helps us ultras identify each other. I almost forgot it myself."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The Milton 32-8 knock was created t..."
links.text: The Milton 32-8 knock was created through data sonification. It's based on the time series data of the world's most profitable bank during its prosperous years in the Thirties. The peak points were turned into the rhythm that makes up the knock.

links.title: Suggestion: "It's a secret handshake of the ultr..."
links.text: It's a secret handshake of the ultra rich, distributed though private-access yacht clubs and interisolary balls for the heirs and heiresses of the old money. Where you picked it up is a mystery.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""But I'm getting side-tracked. Tell..."
links.text: "But I'm getting side-tracked. Tell me about your business proposal. I am all *ears*." His face seems to distort in the blinding light, pulling and twisting at his sides.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""The art market, you say? Possibly...."
links.text: "The art market, you say? Possibly. As I said, I don't carry much money on my person, but do go on -- what are you thinking?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""The art market, you say? Sure. 'Hi..."
links.text: "The art market, you say? Sure. 'Hit me with it', as they say. I'm keen to hear what you have in mind."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""The art market? Intriguing. You've..."
links.text: "The art market? Intriguing. You've already convinced me to invest in you, so please, go on -- tell me what you're thinking."

links.title: You: ""I've recently discovered a local p..."
links.text: "I've recently discovered a local painter with enormous potential." (Show him Cindy's *chef d'oeuvre*.)

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""A painter, eh? I am always looking..."
links.text: "A painter, eh? I am always looking to expand into new asset classes. Who's the artist?"

links.title: You: ""Grotbags. Actually, make that Gran..."
links.text: "Grotbags. Actually, make that Granny Grotbags."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""A-ha. And the name of the piece?"..."
links.text: "A-ha. And the name of the piece?" He leans in to take a good look at the rectangular plastic board coated thick with emulsion.

links.title: You: ""Gross Profit.""
links.text: "Gross Profit."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "There's no sign of a reaction for a..."
links.text: There's no sign of a reaction for a good three seconds. Then...

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Wonderful things aren't they -- na..."
links.text: "Wonderful things aren't they -- names? They can completely change your reading of a person. Or, in this case, a painting."

links.title: You: "Nod confidently."
links.text: Nod confidently.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Before I invest, I need to know mo..."
links.text: "Before I invest, I need to know more about the work. How do I know this asset is going to appreciate with time?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "This is the only question that matt..."
links.text: This is the only question that matters. Fail to come up with an interesting hook and he's out.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Remember, you're not just selling a..."
links.text: Remember, you're not just selling a painting, you're selling a *story*. Give the man a reason to throw down that paper.

links.title: Endurance: "Lying will get you nowhere. You can..."
links.text: Lying will get you nowhere. You can't outrun the truth -- it will catch up to you one day.

links.title: Suggestion: "The comfortably wealthy want their..."
links.text: The comfortably wealthy want their views challenged when making a purchase. Don't hold back.

links.title: You: ""Staring at it long enough lets you..."
links.text: "Staring at it long enough lets you immerse yourself in *karperie*."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""It lets you *immerse yourself* in..."
links.text: "It lets you *immerse yourself* in a modern school of thought? Are you sure?"

links.title: Inland Empire: "Ten seconds -- borders dissipate. T..."
links.text: Ten seconds -- borders dissipate. Twenty seconds -- loss of self. Thirty seconds -- everything dissimilates into raw unreality.

links.title: Conceptualization: "That's just one of the many dangers..."
links.text: That's just one of the many dangers of getting too deep into karperie.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Complete nonsense -- both 'karperie..."
links.text: Complete nonsense -- both 'karperie' and what you just said. Can't bathe in thoughts!

links.title: You: ""Mhmh. Karperie is *dangerous*. It..."
links.text: "Mhmh. Karperie is *dangerous*. It spreads like a virus, infecting entire universities."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""*Dangerous*? I like things that ar..."
links.text: "*Dangerous*? I like things that are dangerous. You could even say I'm one of these 'adrenaline-junkies'." The light emanating from him seems to intensify.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Great work -- that might have done..."
links.text: Great work -- that might have done it.

links.title: You: ""Yes. Spend time with it and the wh..."
links.text: "Yes. Spend time with it and the whole world becomes defined by karperie."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Sounds like a hell of a trip. I re..."
links.text: "Sounds like a hell of a trip. I really must experience it for myself." The light emanating from him seems to intensify.

links.title: You: ""Actually, forget what I said. It d..."
links.text: "Actually, forget what I said. It doesn't really make sense."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I appreciate you saving us from wa..."
links.text: "I appreciate you saving us from wasting time. Is there anything else I should know about the painting?"

links.title: You: ""It's actually just a mixing palett..."
links.text: "It's actually just a mixing palette."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Just a mixing palette? But where d..."
links.text: "Just a mixing palette? But where does the value lie then?"

links.title: Interfacing: "Running your fingertips across the..."
links.text: Running your fingertips across the splatters reveals frequencies used by finance companies for long-distance communication.

links.title: Conceptualization: "That's not very *art*. Tell him it..."
links.text: That's not very *art*. Tell him it contains an invisible pigment used by corporate spies. Own the palette and you can unveil a whole world of concealed communications.

links.title: You: ""This is a cryptograph used by circ..."
links.text: "This is a cryptograph used by circuit benders to bring down banks."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""That changes everything.""
links.text: "That changes everything."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Bit of corporate espionage? He's st..."
links.text: Bit of corporate espionage? He's straight in there. Great job.

links.title: You: ""It contains a unique invisible pai..."
links.text: "It contains a unique invisible paint. You can use it to hide important messages."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Perfect! I've been looking for a w..."
links.text: "Perfect! I've been looking for a way to communicate without the information being intercepted or stolen by rivals."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Sounds like a winner. Good pitch."
links.text: Sounds like a winner. Good pitch.

links.title: You: ""It turns the artistic process into..."
links.text: "It turns the artistic process into the art itself."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""What an original idea! By drawing..."
links.text: "What an original idea! By drawing our focus away from the final piece we gain a new appreciation for the craft behind it. An art in its own right that is usually hidden from us."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "These people will find a way to jus..."
links.text: These people will find a way to justify anything. Looks like you've reeled him.

links.title: You: ""Certainly not in its material form..."
links.text: "Certainly not in its material form. But there's more to it than that."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Go on. I'm listening...""
links.text: "Go on. I'm listening..."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Tell him it was used to mix togethe..."
links.text: Tell him it was used to mix together an invisible pigment. Own it and he opens up a whole world of concealed communications.

links.title: You: ""It's an early entry in an emerging..."
links.text: "It's an early entry in an emerging style known as Art-ishoo."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Emerging? That's a word with plent..."
links.text: "Emerging? That's a word with plenty of appeal. What is it that defines this style exactly?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "The obvious answer is to be illustr..."
links.text: The obvious answer is to be illustrative. However, he would be much more interested in art that directly tackles social issues.

links.title: Volition: "Just tell him the truth. Why does n..."
links.text: Just tell him the truth. Why does no one ever want to tell the truth?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Now is the time to champion the pow..."
links.text: Now is the time to champion the power of the sinuses!

links.title: You: ""It's art that is produced by way o..."
links.text: "It's art that is produced by way of sneezing."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Hm. Seems unhygienic. Is that what..."
links.text: "Hm. Seems unhygienic. Is that what's *in* these days?"

links.title: Composure: "His scintillating face-shape flashe..."
links.text: His scintillating face-shape flashes with an expression that resembles disgust.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""But perhaps I judge too quickly. I..."
links.text: "But perhaps I judge too quickly. Is there an intelligent reasoning behind the method?"

links.title: You: ""The artist enters a state of no-mi..."
links.text: "The artist enters a state of no-mindedness and lets the body take over."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "He swills it around in his brain. "..."
links.text: He swills it around in his brain. "So it's an éxtrasomatic painting. An effort carried out by physical instinct -- not the mind."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Perhaps I *have* been neglecting t..."
links.text: "Perhaps I *have* been neglecting the triumphs of anatomical perspicacity lately..." He sinks into thought.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "He ate that right up. Pretty sure y..."
links.text: He ate that right up. Pretty sure you've done it.

links.title: You: ""Nah, it's just another fad. But th..."
links.text: "Nah, it's just another fad. But there's something else special about this painting."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I see. What is so special about it..."
links.text: "I see. What is so special about it then?"

links.title: You: ""It's art that tackles issues. Art..."
links.text: "It's art that tackles issues. Art plus issues -- Art-ishoo."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I see -- very good. What kinds of..."
links.text: "I see -- very good. What kinds of issues are we talking about? I've really got into the housing crisis recently."

links.title: Logic: "He only wants to hear about struggl..."
links.text: He only wants to hear about struggles he isn't familiar with.

links.title: You: ""Oh yeah, this is all about the hou..."
links.text: "Oh yeah, this is all about the housing crisis. The artist doesn't even have a home."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Poor thing! In that case, buying t..."
links.text: "Poor thing! In that case, buying this will help me fulfil my *noblesse oblige* for the month."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Yeah-yeah, you're doing a good deed..."
links.text: Yeah-yeah, you're doing a good deed here, really giving back to society. Just give us the money already.

links.title: You: ""It's a real spit-and-sawdust affai..."
links.text: "It's a real spit-and-sawdust affair. See those splatters? That's *poor* people."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Oh yes, I see it now. Very *graphi..."
links.text: "Oh yes, I see it now. Very *graphic*, isn't it? Really delivers insight into what it's like being that... unruly."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "That's it, lap it up, buddy. That m..."
links.text: That's it, lap it up, buddy. That might have done it.

links.title: You: ""On second thought, not the kinds o..."
links.text: "On second thought, not the kinds of issues you'd be interested in."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""That's a shame. Is there anything..."
links.text: "That's a shame. Is there anything else to this painting, or is that it?"

links.title: You: ""Splatter, disarray, chaos -- it's..."
links.text: "Splatter, disarray, chaos -- it's anti-design."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""But design is the very signature o..."
links.text: "But design is the very signature of humanity. Everything we do is design. Text columns, urban architecture, the precise shape of a stapler... what are we without any of that?"

links.title: Drama: "Challenge him on this. Cause a scen..."
links.text: Challenge him on this. Cause a scene.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Don't you dare! This isn't the time..."
links.text: Don't you dare! This isn't the time. Put your personal feelings aside -- you're a salesman!

links.title: Inland Empire: "He's so close to envisioning what's..."
links.text: He's so close to envisioning what's beyond. Just needs a little push over the edge...

links.title: You: ""Design is nothing. Let it go. It's..."
links.text: "Design is nothing. Let it go. It's holding you back."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Hmm, I do cling to it rather a lot..."
links.text: "Hmm, I do cling to it rather a lot. Perhaps that is one of my shortcomings -- I just haven't realised it before now."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""That prophet-for-hire did say I sh..."
links.text: "That prophet-for-hire did say I should identify weakness and remove it from my life..."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Here's a prophecy for you, pal. Buy..."
links.text: Here's a prophecy for you, pal. Buying this painting will make your life better (and ours).

links.title: Inland Empire: "So close to envisioning what's beyo..."
links.text: So close to envisioning what's beyond. Just needs a little push over the edge...

links.title: You: ""Exactly. Don't you want to find ou..."
links.text: "Exactly. Don't you want to find out what *else* we could be?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Hm. I hadn't thought about it that..."
links.text: "Hm. I hadn't thought about it that way before. You might have just opened up a new door in my mind."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Doors, windows, toilet seats -- ope..."
links.text: Doors, windows, toilet seats -- open whatever it is you need, buddy. Just get on with making a purchase already!

links.title: You: ""This is a new type of design. You'..."
links.text: "This is a new type of design. You'll work it out if you spend more time with it."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Perhaps I could be the one to 'dis..."
links.text: "Perhaps I could be the one to 'discover' it? To share it with the wider world..."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "That's not how discovery works, but..."
links.text: That's not how discovery works, but let him think whatever he wants if it means he'll buy it.

links.title: You: ""The artist was struggling. *Really..."
links.text: "The artist was struggling. *Really* struggling."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""That's what I wanted to ask you ab..."
links.text: "That's what I wanted to ask you about. Tell me, what's their *story*? Did they *suffer*?"

links.title: You: ""Wait, why does it matter?""
links.text: "Wait, why does it matter?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""An artist's value doubles if they..."
links.text: "An artist's value doubles if they come with a good backstory. I thought you were an experienced art dealer, you should know this."

links.title: Logic: "It's the artist herself who becomes..."
links.text: It's the artist herself who becomes a commodity, not merely their work.

links.title: Empathy: "That's disgusting and thoroughly un..."
links.text: That's disgusting and thoroughly unethical. You should refuse to engage with this.

links.title: You: "(Nod solemnly.) "Terribly.""
links.text: (Nod solemnly.) "Terribly."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Pray tell." The human shape within..."
links.text: "Pray tell." The human shape within the light appears to lean even closer. Tiny dots flood your retina as the shipping container gets too bright.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Any details? I've heard some strug..."
links.text: "Any details? I've heard some struggling families have to sell their organs to pay the rent. There is also the terrible misfortune of having to go get your own groceries when you're poor. Which one is it?"

links.title: Pain Threshold: "This guy clearly gets off on macabr..."
links.text: This guy clearly gets off on macabre stories. You've got just the one -- an absolute skullfuckery.

links.title: Empathy: "You still have an option to not go..."
links.text: You still have an option to not go along with this senseless sensationalism.

links.title: You: ""It's something even worse. See, sh..."
links.text: "It's something even worse. See, she got involved with Mesque bangers..."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""*Mesque bangers*? No! Have I told..."
links.text: "*Mesque bangers*? No! Have I told you I've stopped reading the news? It's too negative, can't let it affect my mojo."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Seems like he's not actually that i..."
links.text: Seems like he's not actually that interested in hearing the details. Too bad, you had a good story cooked up...

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I've found it's much better for my..."
links.text: "I've found it's much better for my health just to throw money at those kinds of problems and hope they go away. That way I don't have to feel guilty about avoiding them."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Looks like he's about to throw some..."
links.text: Looks like he's about to throw some of his money our way...

links.title: You: ""It's the groceries. The poor thing..."
links.text: "It's the groceries. The poor thing has to go to Frittte every day."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""*Every day*?" The blinding light b..."
links.text: "*Every day*?" The blinding light becomes almost melancholy. "But how does she find time to do any work?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""What a sad, sad story. I should as..."
links.text: "What a sad, sad story. I should ask Rhéa to look into this, maybe the foundation can set up some scholarships for cases like these."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "You've reeled him right in. That's..."
links.text: You've reeled him right in. That's got to have done it.

links.title: You: ""It's the organs. She hardly has an..."
links.text: "It's the organs. She hardly has anything left."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Just a hollow husk..." The blindin..."
links.text: "Just a hollow husk..." The blinding light becomes almost melancholy.

links.title: Empathy: "At least she still has her heart in..."
links.text: At least she still has her heart intact, unlike some people here.

links.title: You: ""Actually, I lied. She's from a wor..."
links.text: "Actually, I lied. She's from a working class background, but seems to be doing okay."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Oh." He sounds disappointed. "Well..."
links.text: "Oh." He sounds disappointed. "Well, I'm sure her work represents some very interesting *internal* struggle. Probably with mental illness. Yes, that sounds right."

links.title: You: ""Her socio-economic conditions were..."
links.text: "Her socio-economic conditions were meagre, but her spirit remained strong."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Oh." He sounds disappointed. "Well..."
links.text: "Oh." He sounds disappointed. "Well, I'm sure her work represents some very interesting *internal* struggle. Probably with mental illness. Yes, that sounds right."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""In any case, is there anything *el..."
links.text: "In any case, is there anything *else* you can tell me about this piece?"

links.title: You: ""Actually, she seemed to be doing m..."
links.text: "Actually, she seemed to be doing more than okay. If anyone suffered then it's me."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""You?" The light appears to blink,..."
links.text: "You?" The light appears to blink, as if someone switched off the light source for a second. "But why should we care about *you*?!"

links.title: You: ""You're actually the first person t..."
links.text: "You're actually the first person to see this painting after the artist."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""You mean even *you* haven't looked..."
links.text: "You mean even *you* haven't looked at it?"

links.title: Suggestion: "What he wants to know is how exclus..."
links.text: What he wants to know is how exclusive it is. The more untouched it is, the better.

links.title: You: ""Oh yeah. Duh!""
links.text: "Oh yeah. Duh!"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Still, only two people have seen i..."
links.text: "Still, only two people have seen it thus far. That makes it pretty *exclusive* and therefore potentially valuable."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""And if I don't buy it now, more pe..."
links.text: "And if I don't buy it now, more people will see it -- ergo its value will drop."

links.title: Half Light: "It's now or never!"
links.text: It's now or never!

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Great work. I think you've got him...."
links.text: Great work. I think you've got him. Let's see what he says...

links.title: You: "(Lie.) "I haven't so much as squint..."
links.text: (Lie.) "I haven't so much as squinted at it. It's the exclusivity that gives it value."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I see, so by artificially constrai..."
links.text: "I see, so by artificially constraining supply you're also stimulating demand. I have to say, it's a brilliant strategy..."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Wow, he worked it out all by himsel..."
links.text: Wow, he worked it out all by himself. Such a clever boy. But is he gonna pay up?

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Well, I think that settles it. You..."
links.text: "Well, I think that settles it. You've found a buyer, my friend. A pleasure transacting with you." The light around him warms you like a friendly embrace.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""However, there are a few *complica..."
links.text: "However, there are a few *complications*.... I don't have the cash on me right now to pay for art of this calibre. What I can instead offer are shares in Mauer-Koshlai Mercury Group."
