links.title: Savoir Faire: "Shares -- that's even *better*. You..."
links.text: Shares -- that's even *better*. You can do a lot with them if you play your cards right.

links.title: You: ""Value is something you should *dis..."
links.text: "Value is something you should *discover* for yourself. What do you see?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I see..." The light appears to con..."
links.text: "I see..." The light appears to concentrate...

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I'll be honest, all I see are spla..."
links.text: "I'll be honest, all I see are splatters that lack any true intention."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Why are you letting this opportunit..."
links.text: Why are you letting this opportunity slip away? Give him a story, an experience, make him want to run away with this painting and marry it in secret.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Please, if there's something I'm m..."
links.text: "Please, if there's something I'm missing, I'd love to know what it is."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: You: ""Morve sur toile.""
links.text: "Morve sur toile."

links.title: You: ""The Arduous Slaughter of the Eight..."
links.text: "The Arduous Slaughter of the Eighth Pinniped."

links.title: You: ""Keith.""
links.text: "Keith."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "There's no sign of a reaction for a..."
links.text: There's no sign of a reaction for a good three seconds. Then...

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Keith? Just *Keith*?""
links.text: "Keith? Just *Keith*?"

links.title: Volition: "Yes, Keith. Stick with it."
links.text: Yes, Keith. Stick with it.

links.title: You: "(Nod.) "Keith.""
links.text: (Nod.) "Keith."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Keith," he repeats."
links.text: "Keith," he repeats.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Even the lieutenant looks tense, wa..."
links.text: Even the lieutenant looks tense, waiting to see where this is going...

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Keith, I like it. One of my nephew..."
links.text: "Keith, I like it. One of my nephews is named Keith. We haven't spoken in years, since I declined to pay for his most recent trip to rehab. But perhaps this will help patch things up between us..."

links.title: Half Light: "Sweat pools up in your clavicles, a..."
links.text: Sweat pools up in your clavicles, a rancid smell of *fear*.

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Volition: "What were you thinking -- *KEITH*??..."
links.text: What were you thinking -- *KEITH*??!! You're not starting a boy band here, you're naming a future masterpiece!

links.title: You: ""Let's go with... Lucinda Schweineh..."
links.text: "Let's go with... Lucinda Schweinehack."

links.title: You: ""Cindy the SKULL.""
links.text: "Cindy the SKULL."

links.title: You: ""I'd prefer to keep it a secret.""
links.text: "I'd prefer to keep it a secret."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Not even a pseudonym?" The light a..."
links.text: "Not even a pseudonym?" The light appears to vibrate with surprise.

links.title: You: ""No, a complete mystery. You can ca..."
links.text: "No, a complete mystery. You can call her Anonymous."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Original. I don't think any of my..."
links.text: "Original. I don't think any of my friends have any pieces from anonymous artists. Or maybe only Luca, the son-in-law of the Comte de L'Ys."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The Aloïs-Lorblanchet family is kno..."
links.text: The Aloïs-Lorblanchet family is known to have one of the biggest and most impressive private art collections in the world.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""No, not even him. He might have so..."
links.text: "No, not even him. He might have some Moelles and de Vignys, the *authenticity* of which historians are debating, but I don't think that counts. Perfect."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""And the name of the piece?" He lea..."
links.text: "And the name of the piece?" He leans in to take a good look at the rectangular plastic board coated thick with emulsion.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""The art market? Intriguing. Well,..."
links.text: "The art market? Intriguing. Well, as I said, I don't carry much money on my person. But do go on, what are you thinking?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Ah, a fellow entrepreneur. Tremend..."
links.text: "Ah, a fellow entrepreneur. Tremendous! The art market? Intriguing. Sure, I'm keen. What are you thinking?"

links.title: You: ""I've been thinking about those sha..."
links.text: "I've been thinking about those shares you offered me."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""They could set you up for a *long..."
links.text: "They could set you up for a *long time*. Mauer-Koshlai Mercury is just getting started. Mark my words."

links.title: You: ""What are 'shares' and what can I d..."
links.text: "What are 'shares' and what can I do with them?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""They are the very *unit* of capita..."
links.text: "They are the very *unit* of capital. You can buy them, sell them, even sit on them if you think it wise. Trust me when I say this -- becoming a shareholder means you're part of the *big leagues*."

links.title: You: ""What are these shares worth?""
links.text: "What are these shares worth?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""I bought these shares many years a..."
links.text: "I bought these shares many years ago for a steal. As predicted, Mauer-Koshlai Mercury's operating profit has increased year on year, and there's no signs of it slowing down. People *always* need mercury."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Which means you could net yourself..."
links.text: "Which means you could net yourself a considerable profit if you need some immediate liquidity. But if you don't mind waiting I expect the value of these shares to double within the next five years."

links.title: Logic: "Seems like a clever investment. Def..."
links.text: Seems like a clever investment. Definitely worth thinking about if you care about your future.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Yes, but chances are you can't use..."
links.text: Yes, but chances are you can't use them to buy anything *right now*. No cigarettes, no alcohol, no funky little colourful pills...

links.title: You: ""What is Mauer-Koshlai Mercury Grou..."
links.text: "What is Mauer-Koshlai Mercury Group?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""It's a Gottwaldian-Iilmaraan compa..."
links.text: "It's a Gottwaldian-Iilmaraan company that specialises in extracting mercury. It's seen massive growth lately due to the discovery of rödfärg mercury."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Have you heard about it? At the mo..."
links.text: "Have you heard about it? At the moment, it's trading at more than 1.5x the price of gold. That's because it's an essential component in the next generation of radiocomputers..."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Rehm's using it in their next mode..."
links.text: "Rehm's using it in their next model. I can't wait for mine to turn up! My predictions say its improved speed and azimuthal range should increase my trade efficiency by a whopping 46%. You really should order one if you don't want to be left behind."

links.title: Interfacing: "He's right, the combination of Rehm..."
links.text: He's right, the combination of Rehm's solid engineering and the new rödfärg mercury valves is huge.

links.title: Volition: "A step forward for technology, yes..."
links.text: A step forward for technology, yes -- but only for those who can afford it.

links.title: You: ""We have a deal." (Accept offer.)"
links.text: "We have a deal." (Accept offer.)

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Splendid." You hear the sound of e..."
links.text: "Splendid." You hear the sound of expensive fabrics brushing against each other. When it stops, a roll of paper emerges from the radiance.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It looks almost ethereal -- is it e..."
links.text: It looks almost ethereal -- is it even real?

links.title: You: ""What's that?""
links.text: "What's that?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""This is a stock certificate. Well,..."
links.text: "This is a stock certificate. Well, a photocopy of one. Nevertheless, it's solid proof that you own shares in Mauer-Koshlai Mercury Group."

links.title: You: "(Take the scroll.) "Thanks.""
links.text: (Take the scroll.) "Thanks."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "The light around the individual in..."
links.text: The light around the individual in front of you changes somehow as you take the scroll. You can't figure out what's different -- you just know that it is.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "There! The blinding light dimmed ju..."
links.text: There! The blinding light dimmed just long enough for you to see his true form! He looked like a regular middle-aged man!

links.title: Inland Empire: "Something's rattling within you. It..."
links.text: Something's rattling within you. It feels like the first penny dropped into a piggy bank.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "This transaction has changed the ph..."
links.text: This transaction has changed the physical relationship between you. You are now more alike somehow.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The Weiss-Wiesemann coefficient for..."
links.text: The Weiss-Wiesemann coefficient for you and this individual has now dropped to .9989 repeating.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""That concludes *our part* of the t..."
links.text: "That concludes *our part* of the transaction. Once you've turned over the asset, my people will get the legal ball rolling."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "After you hand over the artwork, th..."
links.text: After you hand over the artwork, the voice from the light says: "Another deal complete. Welcome to the big leagues! If you haven't already, I'd advise you to consider hiring a Personal Brand Strategist."

links.title: You: ""What does a Personal Brand Strateg..."
links.text: "What does a Personal Brand Strategist do?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""What *don't* they do?" The shiny m..."
links.text: "What *don't* they do?" The shiny magnate chuckles. "They practically do everything -- from spotting good investments and analysing design trends, to booking a lunchtime table at the prestigious L'Ambroisie."

links.title: You: ""Could you hook me up with one?""
links.text: "Could you hook me up with one?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Unfortunately not. I only know the..."
links.text: "Unfortunately not. I only know the ones who work with multi-millionaires and beyond. But take a look around and I'm sure you'll find one. Personal Brand Strategists are attracted to money like *sharks* to blood. You'll find having net worth opens many new doors for you."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Here's an *avant-garde* proposal......"
links.text: Here's an *avant-garde* proposal... What about Idiot Doom Spiral? He used to hustle and hang with the sales hawks and trend pushers of the marketing world. Let's ask him if he knows any Personal Brand Strategists.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Oh, and we should see what this net..."
links.text: Oh, and we should see what this net worth can do. Might score a discount, or better yet, get you some free goods. That's the kind of thing that really makes you feel like a hotshot. Ask the local merchants about it if you get the chance.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""So! What's next on the agenda?""
links.text: "So! What's next on the agenda?"

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Personal Brand Strategist, huh? Not..."
links.text: Personal Brand Strategist, huh? Not the kind of person you're likely to find around here. We'll have to ask anyone who seems like they might understand marketing, reputation management... someone who dreams big.

links.title: You: "Joyce might be able to help?"
links.text: Joyce might be able to help?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "She *could*, but she represents the..."
links.text: She *could*, but she represents the Wild Pines, which is the top of that particular game. No way she's stepping down from there. We need someone lower down.

links.title: You: "Evrart seems to know a thing or two..."
links.text: Evrart seems to know a thing or two...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "That old communist?! The only thing..."
links.text: That old communist?! The only thing he'll strategize is a plan to *redistribute* your hard-earned money to losers and moochers!

links.title: You: "Garte seems to have his life togeth..."
links.text: Garte seems to have his life together.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "He's nothing more than a middle man..."
links.text: He's nothing more than a middle manager living a middle-class life -- your aspirations are *much* more ambitious than that.

links.title: You: "No one comes to mind..."
links.text: No one comes to mind...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "We'll stumble upon someone, someone..."
links.text: We'll stumble upon someone, someone with the right amount of *can-do* attitude... I'll let you know when we do. Just keep your eyes open!

links.title: You: ""Thanks, but I need some time to th..."
links.text: "Thanks, but I need some time to think about it." (Decline for now.)

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Not a problem. The offer stands fo..."
links.text: "Not a problem. The offer stands for as long as I'm around these parts."

links.title: You: ""I should get back to my investigat..."
links.text: "I should get back to my investigation. Thanks for your time." [Leave.]

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""The pleasure was mine. Unfortunate..."
links.text: "The pleasure was mine. Unfortunately, I must be away soon. The next time we meet, I'll be expecting an update on my investment!"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Farewell, friend, and may your pea..."
links.text: "Farewell, friend, and may your peace of mind guide you to happiness."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""It was a real pleasure. Sadly, tho..."
links.text: "It was a real pleasure. Sadly, though, my current lifestyle prevents me from remaining more than a brief time in any one place. Perhaps we'll meet again, somewhere far away..."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Thanks for stopping by. If you eve..."
links.text: "Thanks for stopping by. If you ever have an idea you want to pitch me, I'm all ears."

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Why go so soon? I feel we've so mu..."
links.text: "Why go so soon? I feel we've so much more to talk about. Ah, well. Until next time!"

dialogueTree.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "The man stands at the far end of th..."
dialogueTree.text: The man stands at the far end of the shipping container. It's hard to say anything more about him. You cannot make out any of his details, but you do feel the overwhelming presence of... capital.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "The feeling causes all the hairs on..."
links.text: The feeling causes all the hairs on your body to stand at attention like soldiers preparing for review.

links.title: You: "Squint."
links.text: Squint.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "Something's amiss. The light beams..."
links.text: Something's amiss. The light beams bend around his face and scatter in a thousand directions. It seems the laws of physics do not apply here. They are suspended, distorted, an echo.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Trying to visualize the physics at..."
links.text: Trying to visualize the physics at play is liable to give you an aneurysm. Don't think about it too hard!

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "In the general stillness, only your..."
links.text: In the general stillness, only your tongue moves, flickering as you utter...

links.title: You: ""Hello!""
links.text: "Hello!"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Welcome! Come in, make yourself at..."
links.text: "Welcome! Come in, make yourself at home. Sorry I'm not better able to receive you -- I wasn't expecting visitors today."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "You can't *hear* him, exactly, yet..."
links.text: You can't *hear* him, exactly, yet you're able to understand every word he says. It is very strange. An overwhelming hum covers everything -- voice doesn't escape from him.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Now." He claps his hands together...."
links.text: "Now." He claps his hands together. "What can I do for you, good sir?" What you can see of his body appears composed. In a sharp summer suit. And yacht shoes.

links.title: You: ""What's going on in here?""
links.text: "What's going on in here?"

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: ""Welcome, welcome! Not too much, ac..."
links.text: "Welcome, welcome! Not too much, actually, just pleasantly surprised to have company today."

links.title: You: ""Wow.""
links.text: "Wow."

links.title: You: "Cover your eyes..."
links.text: Cover your eyes...
